description.narrative: UNICEF, partner and Government capacity is strengthened to implement equity focused and evidence based programmes informed by socio- cultural dynamics., which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Corporate External Relations And Partnerships, Communication And Resource Mobilization, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Education In Emergencies, Environmental Sustainability, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment, Social Protection, Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: UNICEF, partner and Government capacity is strengthened to implement equity focused and evidence based programmes informed by socio- cultural dynamics.
